creditline: Gift of Mrs. C. M. Skinner in memory of her mother, Mrs. Harry Whiting
description: star cut base faceted Baccarat butterfly consisting of a filigree amethyst bodied butterfly hovering over a white flower; butterfly wings of brilliant colored underlaid flattened set ups; in center of flower is found a typical Baccarat pale yellow, red centered, honeycomb set up; the same attached to green stem and with many leaves
title: Paperweight
